entry.title: The Worlds of TANSTAAFL and The Competitive Quest
entry.summary:
The Competitive Quest

The Competitive Quest Vol.1 #1 1975-10-12 in A&E 6

DnD issues of Clear Ether!

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #4 1976-01-15 in A&E 7 and APA-L 557

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #8 1976-04-04 in A&E 10

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #10 1976-05-17 in A&E 12

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #13 1976-07-14 in A&E 13

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #14 1976-08-19 in A&E 14 (misnumbered as #13)

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #17 1976-11-04 in A&E 17 (misnumbered as #18)

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #19 1977-02-08 in A&E 19

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #21 1977-03-09 in A&E 20

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #25 1977-07-18 in A&E 24 and Lord of Chaos

The Worlds of TANSTAAFL

The Worlds of TANSTAAFL 1983-01 in A&E 89

The Worlds of TANSTAAFL 1983-02 in A&E 90

No idea whether or not there were more of them. But probably not in A&E. (According to Lee Gold’s index, at least, that’s all.)
